entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
